member.name: T:VisioForge.Libs.GStreamer.GstPlayFlags
member.summary: Extra flags to configure the behaviour of the sinks.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Libs.GStreamer.GstPlayFlags.Vis
member.summary: Render visualisation when no video is present.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Libs.GStreamer.GstPlayFlags.ForceFilters
member.summary: Force audio/video filter(s) to be applied.

member.name: F:VisioForge.Libs.GStreamer.GstPlayFlags.ForceSWDecoders
member.summary: Force only software-based decoders(no effect for playbin3).

member.name: P:VisioForge.Libs.PlatformHelper.IsLinux
member.summary: Returns true if running on Linux, false otherwise

member.name: P:VisioForge.Libs.PlatformHelper.IsLinuxDesktop
member.summary: Returns true if running on Linux desktop, false otherwise

member.name: P:VisioForge.Libs.PlatformHelper.IsMac
member.summary: Returns true if running on macOS, false otherwise

member.name: M:VisioForge.Libs.SerilogAdds.Observable.ObservableLoggerConfigurationExtensions.Observers(Serilog.Configuration.LoggerSinkConfiguration,System.Action{System.IObservable{Serilog.Events.LogEvent}},Serilog.Events.LogEventLevel,Serilog.Core.LoggingLevelSwitch)
member.param: An action that provides an observable to which observers can subscribe.
The minimum level for events passed through the sink. Ignored when is specified.
A switch allowing the pass-through minimum level to be changed at runtime.
